evidence: stubtest.yml: # Stubtest depends on different branches and paths than mypy does, so we have a separate workflow.
# getattr is used to side-step mypy
linux.yml: name: mypy (py3.12) & dev deps (py3.14), fast, spin
linux.yml: python -m pip install mypy==1.10.0 types-psutil typing_extensions
lint.yml: # Include pytest compatibility with mypy
lint.yml: pip install pytest $(get_dep ruff min) $(get_dep mypy min) cython-lint
lint.yml: python -c "from importlib.metadata import version; print(f\"mypy={version('mypy')}\")" >> /tmp/versions.txt
lint.yml: # NOTE: We should be able to disable this and consolidate with Pyrefly
lint.yml: # NOTE: mypy needs its own job because it depends on --all-files, without assessing all files it sometimes
_runner-determinator.yml: def get_gh_client(github_token: str) -> Github:  # type: ignore[no-any-unimported]
_runner-determinator.yml: def get_issue(gh: Github, repo: str, issue_num: int) -> Issue:  # type: ignore[no-any-unimported]
ci.yml: - name: Run typechecking integration tests (Pyright)
ci.yml: - name: Run typechecking integration tests (Pyrefly)
ci.yml: name: Tests & Mypy on ${{ matrix.python-version }}
third_party.yml: - name: Checkout mypy for stubtest and mypyc tests
third_party.yml: run: git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/python/mypy.git || git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/python/mypy.git
"S101",    # assert is used by mypy and pytest
pyright.yml: # pin pyright version so a new version doesn't suddenly cause the CI to fail,
pyright.yml: # For help with static-typing issues, or pyright update, ping @Avasam
# pin mypy version so a new version doesn't suddenly cause the CI to fail,
# For help with static-typing issues, or mypy update, ping @Avasam
ci.yml: # `nodejs` for pyright (`node-env` pulls in nodejs but that takes a while and can time out the test).
# Be strict about use of Mypy
"useless-import-alias",  # used as a hint to mypy
runtests.yml: - run: pip install mpmath mypy hypothesis
python-package.yml: run: python -m pip install ruff mypy
python-package.yml: - name: Check types with mypy
lint.yml: run: uvx --with tox-uv tox -e mypy
# Relaxations for code written before mypy was introduced
